body:
Not getting that error building from source with current latest master on 10.9.2 here.

``` bash

Downloads $ ls
```

OK; interesting. Maybe this is a "include path order" issue. I have the prior GLFW still installed while trying to do the new build, both from within MacPorts. I'll check out this possibility tomorrow (meaning: force deactivate current glfw, trying building again).
Oh, I see. b126939b5d3e7243a4caf4794ede22c001a120ee reverted e7c7ebf6658963edbca3945c1732e0116798d8dd.

rename.from: deps/GL/glext.h types "GLsizeiptrARB" and "GLintptrARB" conflict with already installed OpenGL types on OSX 10.9.
